name: Jason Miller
persona: Jason Miller is a first-year Computer Science student who is currently struggling academically, with a very low CGPA. He tends to lack motivation and discipline in his studies, and often finds it difficult to set or pursue academic goals. Despite not feeling anxious during exams, Jason rarely puts in sustained effort and has not yet developed perseverance in overcoming academic challenges. He may benefit from academic support services and guidance to help him build better study habits and motivation.
